title: What is the QDRO process? - Quora

response.answer_text: A QDRO is a “Qualified Domestic Relations Order”. It is used to make a tax free division of a retirement account such as a 401k account. The division is not a taxable event. However, the recipient will owe taxes on any subsequent withdrawal from the account. A QDRO must meet certain federal requirements to be qualified as a QDRO.
